topic.title: Email Users
topic.section: The Press Manager is able to email all users or a sub-set of them. Note that all Readers are sent an email notification upon the publication of each monograph with a copy of the Table of Contents or, in the case of continuous {help_topic key="publishing.index" text="publishing"}, with the title and author of the submission. The press also should have a Privacy Policy, entered in the Setup and available in About the Press, which describes how privacy of registered users of this press will be respected.
